successes.title: Transporter: A New Way to Share, Access and Protect Files
successes.description: Transporter is an online, but off-cloud storage solution for privately sharing, accessing and protecting all of your valuable files.

Pledges.description: Want a Transporter, but can't afford one right now? For a small pledge, you can reserve your username. Not only do you get to feel good for helping us out, but you can make sure no one else gets that special online avatar.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL. One Transporter (no drive) for a sweet price as our way to say "thanks" for helping get things going. Uses any capacity mobile hard drive. Add $10 for shipping.
One Transporter (no drive). It's cool, will completely change the way you manage your files, and you know you want one. Uses any capacity mobile hard drive. Add $10 for shipping.

One Transporter (1TB drive). Share, access, and protect up to a full terabyte of data. That's enough space for 1000 HD movies, 200,000 songs, or 500,000 photos. Completely private. No subscription fees, ever. Add $10 for shipping.

Two Transporters (no drives). If one is cool, two will be amazing. Use one at home and one at the office. Perfect for offsite protection of all your data. Use any capacity mobile hard drives. Add $20 for shipping.

One Transporter (2TB drive). Access, share, and protect up to two terabytes of data. That's enough space for 2,000 HD movies, 400,000 songs, or 1,000,000 photos. Completely private. No subscription fees, ever. Add $10 for shipping.

Developer special. Connect your app to Transporter for no-fee online storage. Kit includes one Transporter (1TB drive), access to the API, and a secret email hotline to help get you going. Your Transporter will ship in January and the API will be available in March.
Two (2) Transporters each with a 1TB drive. Use one at home and one at the office, or keep one for yourself and share the other with a family member or friend. Add $20 for shipping.

The ultimate two pack! Two (2) Transporters each with a 2TB drive. Use one at home and one at the office, or keep one for yourself and share the other with a family member or friend. Add $20 for shipping.
